name: The Plaything
description:
Description

Explore the handcrafted dollhouse and recover the memories of the paper doll who lives there.

Please leave your feedback after playing here: The Plaything Demo Feedback Survey.

This is a project in development by Handcrafted Horrors. The current version is a demo only, and so it is only a small slice of the final game.

Thank you for playing!

Team

Tina Allen - Co-Producer, Lighting Specialist, UI Engineer, Narrative Designer

Taylor Burgess - Concept Artist, Character Artist, Animator

Ben Hunsicker - Co-Producer, Lead Engineer, Narrative Designer

Jake Stone - Technical Artist, UI Artist, Animator

Kalynn Vazquez - Art Director, 3D Artist

Liam Beckley - Sound Designer

Hannah Cabral - Music Composer
